summary: While researching an urban legend on feral children, three friends find themselves trapped in an abandoned high school, where they are confronted with an evil more sinister than the legend itself.
cast: Bobby Campo|Mariah Bonner|Bobby C. King|Cooper Huckabee|Dave Davis|Thomas Francis Murphy|Casey Dillard|Jessica Lemon Wilkinson|Catherine Cappiello|Johnny McPhail|Leigh Hennessy|Peter Lawson Jones|Renada Young|Tony Sanford|Elise Fyke|Jered Meeks|Isaiah LaBorde|Jessica Crump|Arial Esco|Kanisha Esco|Kody Redd|Pam Greer
title: Starve
